Ok, to everyone that has been planning on taking over the prehistoric Ark: it 
is being used as the maximal base at this point. It is not in Oregon, but in 
where Tibet is today.

Also, on the location of the Autobots and Decepticons: The Decepticons are 
currently in Hell Beast's ship, while the Autobots are somewhere where Blue 
Stinger put them.

::Zardus/Striker/Ramulus::

Zardus lands in the alliance base, setting the autoguns on alert just in case 
and walking off to a CR chamber.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker walks into the Ark, heading for the CR chambers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The CR chamber door opens and Ramulus steps out, fully repaired. He walks to 
the bridge and looks around, noting that everything was nearly scrap. He 
growls, looking at a scanner panel that survived the blast. His eyes narrow, 
seeing a blip on the scanner.

"Computer, identify blip." On his orders, the computer reports that the 
detected object is a stasis pod.

Ramulus nods, activating his comm-link. "I am going out for a pod. I will be 
back shortly."

Without waiting for a reply, Ramulus walks out, heading for the pod.
